GSP31iskar_u:2: dṛṣṭavad ānuśravikaḥ sa hy aviśuddhaḥ kṣayātiśayayuktaḥ /
GSP31iskar_u:5: ṣoḍaśakas tu vikāro na prakṛtir na vikṛtiḥ puruṣaḥ // ISk_3 //
GSP31iskar_u:7: trividhaṃ pramāṇam iṣṭaṃ prameyasiddhiḥ pramāṇād dhi // ISk_4 //
GSP31iskar_u:9: tal liṅgaliṅgipūrvakam āptaśrutir āptavacanaṃ tu // ISk_5 //
GSP31iskar_u:10: sāmānyatas tu dṛṣṭād atīndriyāṇāṃ pratītir anumānāt /
GSP31iskar_u:11: tasmād api cāsiddhaṃ parokṣam āptāgamāt sādhyam // ISk_6 //
GSP31iskar_u:13: saukṣmyād vyavadhānād abhibhavāt samānābhihārāc ca // ISk_7 //
GSP31iskar_u:15: mahadādi tac ca kāryaṃ prakṛtivirūpaṃ sarūpaṃ ca // ISk_8 //
GSP31iskar_u:17: śaktasya śakyakaraṇāt kāraṇabhāvāc ca sat kāryam // ISk_9 //
GSP31iskar_u:18: hetumad anityam avyāpi sakriyam anekam āśritaṃ liṅgam /
GSP31iskar_u:19: sāvayavaṃ paratantraṃ vyaktaṃ viparītam avyaktam // ISk_10 //
GSP31iskar_u:20: triguṇam aviveki viṣayaḥ sāmānyam acetana prasavadharmi /
GSP31iskar_u:21: vyaktaṃ tathā pradhānaṃ tadviparītas tathā ca pumān // ISk_11 //
GSP31iskar_u:24: sattvaṃ laghu prakāśakam iṣṭam upaṣṭambhakaṃ calaṃ ca rajaḥ /
GSP31iskar_u:25: guru varaṇakam eva tamaḥ pradīpavac cārthato vṛttiḥ // ISk_13 //
GSP31iskar_u:28: bhedānāṃ parimāṇāt samanvayāc chaktitaḥ pravṛtteś ca /
GSP31iskar_u:30: kāraṇam asty avyaktaṃ pravartate triguṇataḥ samudayāc ca /
GSP31iskar_u:36: tasmāc ca viparyāsāt siddhaṃ sākṣitvam asya puruṣasya /
GSP31iskar_u:37: kaivalyaṃ mādhyasthyaṃ draṣṭṛtvam akartṛbhāvaś ca // ISk_19 //
GSP31iskar_u:38: tasmāt tatsaṃyogād acetanaṃ cetanāvad iva liṅgam /
GSP31iskar_u:39: guṇakartṛtve 'pi tathā karteva bhavaty udāsīnaḥ // ISk_20 //
GSP31iskar_u:41: paṅgvandhavad ubhayor api saṃyogas tatkṛtaḥ sargaḥ // ISk_21 //
GSP31iskar_u:42: prakṛter mahāṃs tato 'haṅkāras tasmād gaṇaś ca ṣoḍaśakaḥ /
GSP31iskar_u:43: tasmād api ṣoḍaśakāt pañcabhyaḥ pañca bhūtāni // ISk_22 //
GSP31iskar_u:44: adhyavasāyo buddhir dharmo jñānaṃ virāga aiśvaryam /
GSP31iskar_u:45: sāttvikam etad rūpaṃ tāmasam asmād viparyastam // ISk_23 //
GSP31iskar_u:49: bhūtādes tanmātraḥ sa tāmasas taijasād ubhayam // ISk_25 //
GSP31iskar_u:52: ubhayātmakam atra manaḥ saṅkalpakam indriyaṃ ca sādharmyāt /
GSP31iskar_u:56: svālakṣaṇyā vṛttis trayasya saiṣā bhavaty asāmānyā /
GSP31iskar_u:58: yugapac catuṣṭayasya hi vṛttiḥ kramaśaś ca tasya nirdiṣṭā /
GSP31iskar_u:59: dṛṣṭe tathāpy adṛṣṭe trayasya tatpūrvikā vṛttiḥ // ISk_30 //
GSP31iskar_u:61: puruṣārtha eva hetur na kenacit kāryate karaṇam // ISk_31 //
GSP31iskar_u:63: kāryaṃ ca tasya daśadhāhāryaṃ dhāryaṃ prakāśyaṃ ca // ISk_32 //
GSP31iskar_u:64: antaḥkaraṇaṃ trividhaṃ daśadhā bāhyaṃ trayasya viṣayākhyam /
GSP31iskar_u:65: sāmpratakālaṃ bāhyaṃ trikālam ābhyantaraṃ karaṇam // ISk_33 //
GSP31iskar_u:67: vāg bhavati śabdaviṣayā śeṣāny api pañcaviṣayāṇi // ISk_34 //
GSP31iskar_u:68: sāntaḥkaraṇā buddhiḥ sarvaṃ viṣayam avagāhate yasmāt /
GSP31iskar_u:69: tasmāt trividhaṃ karaṇaṃ dvāri dvārāṇi śeṣāṇi // ISk_35 //
GSP31iskar_u:71: kṛtsnaṃ puruṣasyārthaṃ prakāśya buddhau prayacchanti // ISk_36 //
GSP31iskar_u:72: sarvaṃ pratyupabhogaṃ yasmāt puruṣasya sādhayati buddhiḥ /
GSP31iskar_u:73: saiva ca viśinaṣṭi tataḥ pradhānapuruṣāntaraṃ sūkṣmam // ISk_37 //
GSP31iskar_u:74: tanmātrāṇy aviśeṣās tebhyo bhūtāni pañca pañcabhyaḥ /
GSP31iskar_u:75: ete smṛtā viśeṣāḥ śāntā ghorāś ca mūḍhāś ca // ISk_38 //
GSP31iskar_u:76: sūkṣmā mātāpitṛjāḥ saha prabhūtais tridhā viśeṣāḥ syuḥ /
GSP31iskar_u:77: sūkṣmās teṣāṃ niyatā mātāpitṛjā nivartante // ISk_39 //
GSP31iskar_u:79: saṃsarati nirupabhogaṃ bhāvair adhivāsitaṃ liṅgam // ISk_40 //
GSP31iskar_u:80: citraṃ yathāśrayamṛte sthāṇvādibhyo vinā yathā chāyā /
GSP31iskar_u:81: tadvad vināviśeṣais tiṣṭhati na nirāśrayaṃ liṅgam // ISk_41 //
GSP31iskar_u:83: prakṛter vibhutvayogān naṭavad vyavatiṣṭhate liṅgam // ISk_42 //
GSP31iskar_u:84: sāṃsiddhikāś ca bhāvāḥ prākṛtikā vaikṛtāś ca dharmādyāḥ /
GSP31iskar_u:85: dṛṣṭāḥ karaṇāśrayiṇaḥ kāryāśrayiṇaś ca kalalādyāḥ // ISk_43 //
GSP31iskar_u:86: dharmeṇa gamanam ūrdhvaṃ gamanam adhastād bhavaty adharmeṇa /
GSP31iskar_u:87: jñānena cāpavargo viparyayād iṣyate bandhaḥ // ISk_44 //
GSP31iskar_u:88: vairāgyāt prakṛtilayaḥ saṃsāro rājasād bhavati rāgāt /
GSP31iskar_u:91: guṇavaiṣamyavimardena tasya bhedās tu pañcāśat // ISk_46 //
GSP31iskar_u:92: pañca viparyayabhedā bhavanty aśakteś ca karaṇavaikalyāt /
GSP31iskar_u:94: bhedas tamaso 'ṣṭavidho mohasya ca daśavidho mahāmohaḥ /
GSP31iskar_u:97: saptadaśa vadhā buddher viparyayāt tuṣṭisiddhīnām // ISk_49 //
GSP31iskar_u:99: bāhyā viṣayoparamāt pañca nava ca tuṣṭayo 'bhihitāḥ // ISk_50 //
GSP31iskar_u:101: dānaṃ ca siddhayo 'ṣṭau siddheḥ pūrvo 'ṅkuśas trividhaḥ // ISk_51 //
GSP31iskar_u:102: na vinā bhāvair liṅgaṃ na vinā liṅgena bhāvanirvṛttiḥ /
GSP31iskar_u:103: liṅgākhyo bhāvākhyas tasmād bhavati dvidhā sargaḥ // ISk_52 //
GSP31iskar_u:104: aṣṭavikalpo daivas tairyagyonaś ca pañcadhā bhavati /
GSP31iskar_u:105: mānuṣyaś caikavidhaḥ samāsato bhautikaḥ sargaḥ // ISk_53 //
GSP31iskar_u:106: ūrdhvaṃ sattvaviśālas tamoviśālaś ca mūlataḥ sargaḥ /
GSP31iskar_u:108: atra jarāmaraṇakṛtaṃ duḥkhaṃ prāpnoti cetanaḥ puruṣaḥ /
GSP31iskar_u:111: pratipuruṣavimokṣārthaṃ svārtha iva parārtha ārambhaḥ // ISk_56 //
GSP31iskar_u:115: puruṣasya vimokṣārthaṃ pravartate tadvad avyaktam // ISk_58 //
GSP31iskar_u:116: raṅgasya darśayitvā nivartate nartakī yathā nṛtyāt /
GSP31iskar_u:117: puruṣasya tathātmānaṃ prakāśya vinivartate prakṛtiḥ // ISk_59 //
GSP31iskar_u:119: guṇavaty aguṇasya satas tasyārtham apārthakaṃ carati // ISk_60 //
GSP31iskar_u:120: prakṛteḥ sukumārataraṃ na kiñcid astīti me matir bhavati /
GSP31iskar_u:121: yā dṛṣṭāsmīti punar na darśanam upaiti puruṣasya // ISk_61 //
GSP31iskar_u:122: tasmān na badhyate nāpi mucyate nāpi saṃsarati kaścit /
GSP31iskar_u:123: saṃsarati badhyate mucyate ca nānāśrayā prakṛtiḥ // ISk_62 //
GSP31iskar_u:124: rūpaiḥ saptabhir evaṃ badhnāty ātmānam ātmanā prakṛtiḥ /
GSP31iskar_u:125: saiva ca puruṣasyārthaṃ prati vimocayaty ekarūpeṇa // ISk_63 //
GSP31iskar_u:126: evaṃ tattvābhyāsān nāsmi na me nāham ity apariśeṣam /
GSP31iskar_u:127: aviparyayād viśuddhaṃ kevalam utpadyate jñānam // ISk_64 //
GSP31iskar_u:129: prakṛtiṃ paśyati puruṣaḥ prekṣakavad avasthitaḥ svasthaḥ // ISk_65 //
GSP31iskar_u:133: aikāntikam ātyantikam ubhayaṃ kaivalyam āpnoti // ISk_68 //
GSP31iskar_u:136: etat pavitryam agryaṃ munir āsuraye 'nukampayā pradadau /
GSP31iskar_u:137: āsurir api pañcaśikhāya tena ca bahulīkṛtaṃ tantram // ISk_70 //
GSP31iskar_u:139: saṅkṣiptam āryamatinā samyag vijñāya siddhāntam // ISk_71 //
GSP31iskar_u:140: saptatyāṃ kila yo 'rthās te 'rthāḥ kṛtsnasya ṣaṣṭitantrasya /
GSP31iskar_u:142: tasmāt samāsadṛṣṭaṃ śāstram idaṃ nārthataś ca parihīnam /
GSP31iskar_u:143: tantrasya ca bṛhanmūrter darpaṇasaṅkrāntam iva bimbam // ISk_73 //
